import{makeAutoObservable}from'mobx';import{isEqual}from'lodash';/**
 * store for config
 * @class
 */export default class ShapeStore{constructor(rootStore){/**
   * root store
   */this.rootStore=void 0;this.updatedShapes=[];this.selectedShapes=[];makeAutoObservable(this,{rootStore:false},{autoBind:true});this.rootStore=rootStore;}setUpdatedShapes(shapes){if(!isEqual(shapes,this.updatedShapes)){this.updatedShapes=shapes;}}setMultiSelectedShape(shapes){this.selectedShapes=shapes;}}
